text.text:
↳ `adapter/` - Adapters for different web frameworks
  ↳ `app/` - Core app implementation
  ↳ `async_app.py` - Async version of the app
  ↳ `authorization/`, `oauth/` - Auth handling
  ↳ `middleware/`, `listener/` - Event processing
  ↳ `workflows/` - Workflow step support
  ↳ `context/`, `request/`, `response/` - Request/response handling

↳ Framework integrations: `flask`, `fastapi`, `django`, `sanic`, `starlette`, `tornado`, `bottle`, `falcon`, `pyramid`
  ↳ Cloud platforms: `aws_lambda`, `aws_chalice`, `google_cloud_functions`, `google_cloud_run`, `google_app_engine`, `heroku`
  ↳ Features: `oauth_app.py`, `socket_mode.py`, `modals_app.py`, `workflow_steps/`, `assistants/`
  ↳ Example apps showing dialogs, events, messages, etc.

↳ `slack_bolt/` - Tests for sync version
  ↳ `slack_bolt_async/` - Tests for async version
  ↳ `adapter_tests/` - Adapter tests
  ↳ `scenario_tests/` - End-to-end scenarios
  ↳ Mock servers for testing
‣ *`requirements/`* - Dependency files for different use cases:

↳ `adapter.txt` - Web framework adapters
  ↳ `async.txt` - Async dependencies
  ↳ `testing.txt` - Test dependencies

‣ `pyproject.toml` - Modern Python project config
‣ `setup.cfg` - Package setup
‣ `.flake8` - Linting config
‣ `codecov.yml` - Code coverage config
This is a well-organized, production-ready Python package with extensive examples for virtually every major Python web framework and cloud platform!
